about.title: About MV Automotive
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in automotive care in Irving, Texas
about.story1: MV Automotive has been serving the Irving, Texas community with dedication and excellence. Owned and operated by Mario Buenrostro, what started as a small family-owned shop has grown into a trusted automotive service center known for quality workmanship and honest service.
about.story2: Our commitment to customer satisfaction and technical expertise has made us the go-to choice for thousands of vehicle owners. We believe in building lasting relationships with our customers through transparent communication, fair pricing, and reliable service.
about.story3: At MV Automotive, we don't just fix cars—we care for them. Every vehicle that comes through our doors receives the same attention to detail and quality service, whether it's a routine oil change or a complex engine repair.
about.qualityWorkDesc: We use only the highest quality parts and follow manufacturer specifications for every repair.
about.experienceDesc: Over 20 years of combined experience with continuous training on the latest automotive technology.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from diagnostics to customer communication.
about.customerFirstDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We listen, communicate clearly, and always do what's right.
about.certifiedTechDesc: All our mechanics are ASE certified and continuously trained on the latest automotive technology.
about.warrantyDesc: We stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties on parts and labor.
about.competitivePricingDesc: Fair, transparent pricing with no hidden fees. We provide detailed estimates before any work begins.
about.modernEquipmentDesc: State-of-the-art diagnostic equipment to accurately identify and fix issues quickly.
about.convenientLocationDesc: Easy access with ample parking and comfortable waiting area with free WiFi.
about.allMakesDesc: We service all vehicle types, from domestic to imported, classic to modern.

seo.homeTitle: MV Automotive - Professional Car Repair & Auto Service
seo.homeDescription: MV Automotive offers expert car repair, maintenance, and automotive services. Trusted mechanics with years of experience. Schedule your service today!
seo.servicesDescription: Comprehensive automotive services including engine repair, brake service, oil changes, transmission service, and more. Expert mechanics at MV Automotive.
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about MV Automotive - a trusted car repair shop with over 20 years of experience. Expert mechanics committed to quality service and customer satisfaction.
seo.contactDescription: Contact MV Automotive for car repair services. Call us at (903) 917-1354 or visit us at 1723 Peters Rd 443, Irving, TX 75061. Schedule your appointment today!
